}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DAXA01.SGA" and "2012/02/01" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]]
===Features=== Features 5GHz 802.11ac 3x3 and external Rx filter, DAXA-92 delivers up to 1.3Gbps data rate and provides the excellent radio rejection against the interfering signal from the 2nd 2.4GHz Wi-Fi module on dual-band dual con-current applications.
*802.11an/ac (5GHz), RF power (20dBm) *Data rate: up to 1.3Gbps (20/40/80MHz)
==Links of Interest== [https://www.unex.com.tw/download/577c94036a319/6 Datasheet]
